title: An Introduction to R Programming Language
text: R is a free, open-source programming language and software environment for statistical computing, bioinformatics, visualization and general computing. R provides a wide variety of statistical and graphical techniques, and is highly extensible. The latest version of R can be obtained from https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/.

title: Software
text:
This page provides links to R packages I have (co)authored. The most recent versions of most packages are on github. Most R packages are also available on CRAN.






ICsurv: Semiparametric Regression Analysis of Interval-Censored Data
üîó CRAN Page
üìù An R package for semiparametric regression analysis of interval-censored data, providing robust statistical tools for handling censored data in various applications.




aenetgt: Adaptive Elastic Net for Group Testing
üîó GitHub Repository
üìù Software for implementing adaptive elastic net regression for group testing, optimizing variable selection in pooled testing data analyses.




GAM: Generalized Additive Regression for Group Testing Data
üîó GitHub Repository
üìù Software for applying generalized additive regression to group testing data, providing flexible modeling for pooled testing analyses.




JMTB: Bayesian Regression Model for Group Testing Data
üîó GitHub Repository
üìù Implements a Bayesian regression model with spike and slab variable selection for group testing data.




Seroprevalence-Trends: Regional Trends in Canine Seroprevalence
üîó GitHub Repository
üìù Analyzes regional trends in Borrelia burgdorferi and Anaplasma spp. seroprevalence in domestic dogs (2013-2019).




Group-Testing: Dilution Effect in Group Testing Regression
üîó GitHub Repository
üìù Novel approach for acknowledging the dilution effect in group testing regression.




binGroup2: R Package for Group Testing
üîó CRAN Page
üìù Provides statistical tools for group testing analysis in infectious disease surveillance.




SIGHR: Side Information Guided High-Dimensional Regression
üîó GitHub Repository
üìù Enhances predictive modeling by incorporating auxiliary data in high-dimensional analyses.




semipadd2pop: Semiparametric Additive Modeling
üîó GitHub Repository
üìù Combines multiple datasets for flexible semiparametric additive modeling.




Mixed.SVM: Bayesian Mixed Effects SVM
üîó GitHub Repository
üìù Models daily substance use disorder patterns using Bayesian mixed effects support vector machines. ‚Äî
